definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
to revisit old haunts (idiom); down memory lane

sentences.english: Remember repeat business is why you are in business.
sentences.chinese: 记得你是旧地重游，所以生意。

sentences.english: Go, let the old ground with me once.
sentences.chinese: 走吧，陪我旧地重游一次吧。

sentences.english: One day at a certain time, to return.
They revisit mutual haunts and mutual friends.
sentences.chinese: 他们会重回旧地，或者走访一些双方共同的朋友。

sentences.english: It feel strange to is visiting the place again after all these year.
sentences.chinese: 时隔多年，旧地重访使人感到很新奇。

sentences.english: Here we are again, Its like a dream, but this is real to me (yeah)
sentences.chinese: 现在咱们旧地重游，如梦一场，但这都是真的。

sentences.english: It feels strange to BE visiting the place again after all these years.
sentences.chinese: 时隔多年，旧地重访使人感到很新奇。

definition: to revisit old haunts (idiom); down memory lane
old site/site of sth (palace, ancient state etc) that no longer exists
(lit.) leftover men/(fig.) loyalist adherents of a former dynasty/surviving members of an ethnic group
fire beacon (used as alarm signal over long distance)
